user_description.ru: Она на коленях у твоих ног, целует и лижет твои ступни и пальцы.
user_description.en: She kneels at your feet, kissing and licking your soles and toes.

ai_description.ru: Она на коленях у его ног. Целует, лижет, массирует. Демонстрация преданности и подчинения через внимание к его ступням.
ai_description.en: She's on her knees at his feet. Kissing, licking, massaging. Showing devotion and submission through attention to his feet.

image_prompt: woman kneeling at mans feet, kissing his bare foot, he sitting relaxed, she in lingerie, simple bedroom setting without furniture emphasis, soft lighting
